alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 9:02PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crook County through 930 PM MDT... At 902 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southwest of Carlile, or 24 miles west of Sundance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keyhole Reservoir around 905 PM MDT. Pine Haven and Carlile around 910 PM MDT. Devils Tower Junction around 920 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 168 and 169. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
